name: POST-TOXIC AQUANATOR!
description:
The ocean is full of toxic waste barrels. You, the Post-Toxic Aquanator goldfish,  must get rid of them to restore the ocean's health.

How To Play

  • Ocean Health is slowly reducing.
  • If Ocean Health reaches zero you lose.
  • Get the Ocean Health to maximum to win.
  • To do that >>
  • Collect a coloured pill to change your colour.
  • Crash into a toxic barrel with your new colour to neutralise toxic-waste & increase Ocean Health.
  • Avoid the jittery red mutated jellyfish on the ocean floor - they drain Ocean 
  • Health.
  • Use mouse to move your goldfish left & right.
  • Click mouse button to start game.
  • Click mouse button to move on from win/lose screen.

Created for Guildford Game Festival Game Jam 2020.

Tools used

  • Javascript / P5
  • Leshy FX Maker
  • Toxic symbol from OpenClipArt
  • Pattern vector created by macrovector - www.freepik.com
  • Other textures public domain
